Title: Application of a minimal compatible element to incompressible and nearly incompressible continuum mechanics
Abstract: © 2020 The Author(s)In this note we will explore some applications of the recently constructed piecewise affine, H1-conforming element that fits in a discrete de Rham complex (Christiansen and Hu, 2018). In particular we show how the element leads to locking free methods for incompressible elasticity and viscosity robust methods for the Brinkman model.
